document.full_text: the securities and exchange commission (sec) is probing whether two major banks made proper representations to pension-fund clients about how their currency trades would be handled and priced, the wall street journal reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.
document.title: sec deepens probe of forex trading: report
lines_and_colors: the securities and exchange commission (sec) is probing whether two major banks made proper representations to pension-fund clients about how their currency trades would be handled and priced, the wall street journal reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.
